ACER & @CEERenergy  present today the #conclusions of #2019 #MarketMonitoringReportü§ù.

"#Hydrogen will play a role in #EU #decarbonisation. We need an #adequate balance between #gas and #hydrogen #infrastructures and good technical solutions at #EU level, to move out of #local clusters" - says Christian Zinglersen @EP_Industry üîµüá™üá∫

#MarketMonitoringReport

Christian Zinglersen @EP_Industry:

- ACER will continue it's #work at its best
- Achieving a #sustainable & #resilient #recovery will be a priority after #COVID19 #pandemic. Cost-efficient #marketintegration & extensive #monitoring will be key.
#MarketMonitoringReport
@ZdzKrasnodebski @EP_Industry : has #COVID19 #pandemic strengthened #decarbonisation?üåê

#MarketMonitoringReport presentation @EP_Industry - Q&A:
- ACER #responsibilities have increased, but what is the budgetary impact?
- We need strong #push to integrate #energy market. How to ensure continuation of positive RES trend after #COVID19? What's the pandemic #impact? https://t.co/C1lCcMbFuZ

üîî#Retail markets is more disparate across #Europe than for #wholesale markets‚Äù ‚Äì notes the Director. 

For the #energytransition to be successful, #consumers need to be informed, supported and empowered throughout this #transformation. @EP_Industry

"#Electricity #integration has still room for #improvement" - More #challenges with the 70% #target to be met, further increase for #marketcoupling" - it's the second key message of #MarketMonitoringReport https://t.co/SjGGURNtvH
#MarketMonitoringReport presentation @EP_Industry:  "#Gas market rules are working well, but we should avoid #fragmentation" - says Christian Zinglersen.

üëâConsumer #engagement is improving. However, the rollout of #smartmeters continues to vary across the #EU, limiting the provision of #realtime #information to #energy #consumers. 
@eu_acer #MarketMonitoringReport https://t.co/loPIaaT4qp

üá™üá∫#Switching #rates among #EU #energy #consumers vary between #MemberStates ranging from 1% to 20%.

#MarketMonitoringReport #energytwitter

üü°Regulated prices continue in some #MemberStates, hampering the #entry of new #suppliers into the #energymarkets. 

This reduces #competition and #consumers‚Äô #choice.

#MarketMonitoringReport https://t.co/25o2PN7Nan

üì£ACER and @CEERenergy #published the #Retail and #ConsumerProtection volume of its #MarketMonitoringReportüìñ! 

üîçThe study finds that #consumers paid more for #electricity and #gas in 2019, as #energy #prices increased across #Europe.

Read moreüëâ: https://t.co/w8oFpxrQxk https://t.co/es61bQ0qM2

Electricity‚ö°Ô∏è: #ACER consults on #barriers hampering #competition, by preventing an efficient #price formation, easy #market entry and #participation in the #European #electricity markets üá™üá∫.

üí° #Share your views by 25 October 2020!

Read moreüëâ: https://t.co/HsdYEPYQf5 https://t.co/1aha9vJreC

#Lack of sufficient cross-border #capacity is a #barrier for the #integration of #electricity #marketsüåê. 

üü¢Despite some #progress, 2019 analysis showed the amount of #crossborder capacity available to trade does not meet the #70% minimum #target required by the #CEP.

#Delays in the #implementation of the flow-based #marketcoupling project in the Core region, hinders the #integration process. 

The implementation of this project in line with ACER Decision should remain a #priority for #regional #TSOs.

Find out moreüëâ: https://t.co/anzIIyyIeA

#Capacity #mechanisms remain in use in some Member States although some do not seem to face an #adequacy problem üá™üá∫‚ö°Ô∏è. 

The lack of a consistent #framework identifying #resource adequacy concerns, emphasises the need for enhanced #adequacy assessments. https://t.co/B2B2gFXW7f

#EU #energytransition must build on #efficient & #integrated markets.

The #efficiency level in the use of #crosszonal #capacity reflects the progress of integration projects. #Dayahead markets are better integrated than #intraday markets. 

#Balancing markets can still improve. https://t.co/CVQsm9kcsx

In 2019, the number of #negative #prices saw its highest increase, almost #doubling the 2018 levelüîç.

Negative #prices occur at times of high #renewable #energy production with low #demand, and #inflexible #generators.

#MarketMonitoringReport https://t.co/arWiafzaJj

COVID-19 #pandemic and #lockdown measures have affected significantly the #energy systems. 

üí°Markets witnessed unprecedented decline in #EU #electricity #demand (-7%) in the first half of #2020 and historically low prices in almost all #EU #bidding zones. https://t.co/letw1RIvit

ACER just #published the Electricity Wholesale volume of its #MarketMonitoringReportüì£

The study analyses progress in #markets‚Äô integration, and provides a preliminary assessment of the impact of #COVID19 #pandemic‚ö°Ô∏è

Read more about the main findingsüìô: https://t.co/Y39qVGzhIm https://t.co/b2EoFtFMhs

Every year, the¬†#EMITForum¬†connects key energy stakeholders to discuss¬†#integrity¬†and¬†#transparency of the #energymarkets.

üì¢ACER Report on #Cross-Border #Cost-Allocation (#CBCA) decisions for #electricity and #gas Projects of Common Interest (#PCIs) just published.

Most projects allocate costs on a territorial basis; decisions appear to be taken to enable EU grants for works. https://t.co/CmgjH9juM8
Any #upgrade of gas #market rules should build on the current market #design to ensure #decarbonisation #transition does not lead to market #fragmentation and loss of #benefits for #EU #consumers.

The implementation of #TAR network code improves network #tariffs‚Äô #transparency and cost-reflectivity. 

The implementation of #BAL #NC improves #liquidity of #spot markets.

The implementation of gas network codes improves the #functioning of and the #access to #EU #wholesale market üá™üá∫.

#CAM network code and #CMP guidelines facilitate market-based capacity #booking and #use also by discouraging #capacity #hoarding. https://t.co/XT3QSOZYcG

#Common rules regulating #access and #operation of #EU gas transportation systems increased #gas price integration between #MSs, #supply side #competition and boosted wholesale markets #liquidity. 

#Regional #differences persist. https://t.co/rh4uIcJuMu

ACER just #published the Gas Wholesale volume of its #MarketMonitoringreport! 

It provides an overview of #gas market developments, impact of #networkcodes, state of EU gas #hubs and recommendations to improve gas markets, in view of decarbonisation.

Great discussion on challenges for making #EnergySystemIntegration a reality, the key role of #governance to ensure all initiatives point in the same direction, and the need for benchmarks to assess progress and course correct where needed üí° https://t.co/QbZpc1xmEw

National #regulators are mostly in favour of a #European approach for setting #hydrogen admixing limits. ACER and the European NRAs are committed in #workingtogether to deliver the most effective regulatory solutions!ü§ù
Selected investments will be needed to foster the #integration. A special focus should be given in the gas network #development plans.

The #readiness of gas transmission networks to accept #hydrogen or #biomethane is very diverse across the #EU. Pure hydrogen networks could be built in parallel with the #blending of hydrogen in the existing networks.

As the @EU_Commission unveils its EU #hydrogenstrategy, ACER publishes a report investigating the level of readiness for admixing #hydrogen and injecting #biomethane in the existing gas networks, and future network #adaptations.

https://t.co/hmSk4x4jSC https://t.co/Zi5pZYGEmj
